name: Twin Thunders Flurry
prerequisiteFormula: (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND ((@feat:improved_two_weapon_fighting AND @feat:two_weapon_fighting) OR @ability:flurry_of_blows#unchained_monk) AND @feat:twin_thunders AND @feat:weapon_focus#selected_weapon AND @bab >= 6
descriptionText: Your dual bludgeoning strikes are especially deadly when you are fighting giants.
